frontmatter.title: A better way to connect to NgRx store
frontmatter.excerpt: The state from NgRx store is an observable stream. It is a little bit tricky to access it. This post provides a better way to handle it.

frontmatter.title: Angular ControlContainer
frontmatter.excerpt: ControlContainer solves the issue how the parent form accesses or controls and child form when they reside in different components.
